title: Minecraft 携带版 Alpha 0.12.1 build6 已发布
author: 广药
txt_content:
本帖最后由 WuGuangYao2012 于 2015-8-7 19:24 编辑 



https://docs.google.com/document/d/11tUgbssVOAwT0xD1_sB_CJV3Ugl4hZSdVDBbFwayxXA/pub 需翻墙
Tweaks
-Reordered stone shovel and stone hoe to match other items in the creative list
-Changed particles when placing water in the Nether
-Lava is now brighter
-Ghasts will hit you more reliably
-Added camera mode slider on options (First-person, Third-person, Front third-person)
Bug Fixes
-Creative players won’t be killed by void anymore
-Fixed base ores (iron, gold) dropping multiple times when using fortune pickaxes
-Fixed lava flowing slowly in the Nether
-Breaking chests will drop enchanted items correctly.
-Fixed crafting single-dimension items (swords, shovel) in multiplayer.
-Boat types now have different colors when held in hand
-Fixed mobs becoming dark when moving over soul sand
-Fixed wool particles when jumping
-Anvil renaming can now be used on Android devices
-Anvil works correctly in multiplayer
-Fixed not being able to exit the options screen after setting a skin


◎修改
-在创造模式物品列表中重新排序石铲和石锄，以便对应相应物品
-改变在地狱放水的粒子效果
-岩浆现在更明亮
-恶魂会更加精确地攻击你
-在选项中添加摄像机模式滑块(第一人称，第三人称，第三人称前视图)
◎漏洞修复
-创造模式玩家不再会被虚空杀死
-修复基本的矿石(铁，金)在用时运镐挖掘时多次掉落
-修复了岩浆在地狱流动缓慢
-破坏箱子能够正确掉落附魔物品
-修复了多人游戏中制作一维物品(剑，铲)的问题
-不同种类的船现在拿在手里显示不同的颜色
-修复了生物走过灵魂沙时变黑的问题
-修复了跳跃时出现的羊毛粒子效果
-铁砧重命名物品现在在Android设备上可用
-在多人游戏中，铁砧能够正常使用
-修复了设置完皮肤后无法退出选项菜单的问题
